name: unsurprisingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not surprising: Perhaps unsurprisingly, the film was not a success. Room service is impeccable, unsurprisingly. See
unsurprising
More examplesFewer examplesThe industry is unsurprisingly uneasy about their prospects this Christmas. Unsurprisingly perhaps, their friendship faltered as his fame grew.There are those who doubt her ability, but unsurprisingly she wouldn't agree.
